conversion_verification.notes: The model represents a true isometric 3D cutaway with consistent wall height and interior volume.

3d_conversion_fundamentals.notes: Excellent 3D transformation with clear wall thickness and clean geometry; slight minor perspective distortion at the far edges.

geometric_accuracy.notes: High layout fidelity; all rooms/partitions match the 2D layout. Entrance doors and window placements are highly accurate.

interior_elements.notes: Furniture placement is nearly 1:1 with the floor plan, including correctly oriented beds, dining sets, and bathroom fixtures.

visual_clarity.notes: Very clean clay-style render; lighting provides great depth. Minus points for some slight 'blocky' artifacts in furniture corners.

detected_errors.description: The kitchen island/breakfast bar area is slightly simplified compared to the complex cabinetry shown in the CAD drawing.

summary: This is a geometrically faithful and high-quality 3D conversion that accurately maps the complex CAD layout into a clean isometric model.
